revised_title: Vibration-Rotation Bands and Molecular Constants of Methyl Isocyanide and its Deuterated Derivative
tldr: The authors measured the vibration-rotation bands of methyl isocyanide and its deuterated derivative with higher resolution than previously recorded. They determined the rotational structure and molecular constants for both molecules, as well as the Coriolis coupling coefficients for the degenerate vibrations. The study provides a more detailed understanding of the infrared spectra and molecular properties of these compounds.
